title: Runnap – Smart Running Tracker
desc:
Local storage for offline tracking
Dynamic background that changes based on weather and time
Air Quality Index (AQI) search with real-time data
Distance calculation for accurate tracking
Three sports modes (Running, Cycling, Walking)
Run time recommendations based on AQI index

title: MyQuiz – Multiplayer Quiz Platform
desc:
Firebase real-time database for storing and managing quizzes
Multiplayer support for simultaneous gameplay across multiple devices

title: AI Stock Market Predictor Using TensorFlow
desc:
Developed a deep learning model to analyze stock trends and predict future movements with 85% accuracy.
Utilized LSTM (Long Short-Term Memory) on RNN (Recurrent Neural Network) for time-series forecasting.
Trained on historical market data from Kaggle datasets about Google stock.
Implemented in Python using TensorFlow and Keras, with data preprocessing using Pandas and NumPy.
Visualized results using Matplotlib

title: AI-Powered Trash Classifier Using CNN
desc:
Developed a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) model to classify waste into categories such as plastic, metal, paper, and organic.
Trained on a dataset of 23,000 images collected from various online sources.
Achieved 95% accuracy in classification using TensorFlow and Keras.
Applied data augmentation techniques to improve model generalization.
Optimized performance using Adam optimizer and softmax as its output layer.
Integrated with OpenCV for real-time waste detection.

title: Message Encryption: Secure Message Encryption with IV & Randomization
desc:
Developed a custom Python-based encryption system focused on data confidentiality and unpredictability.
The algorithm utilizes a secret Key and Initialization Vector (IV), combined with scrambling and randomization techniques, ensuring that identical plaintext messages always produce unique encrypted outputs.
This effectively prevents pattern recognition and ciphertext repetition, enhancing resistance against cryptanalysis.

title: AllApp - Smart Home Dashboard
desc:
Frosted glass UI & dynamic effects
Real-time temperature, AQI, and weather updates
Seamless integration of multiple data sources

title: HourlyLearn: Smart Study Time Tracker with Pomodoro & Reminders
desc:
Built an Android app using Flutter to help students optimize their learning sessions using the Pomodoro technique.
Designed and developed in just 1 week, HourlyLearn enables users to track their hourly study progress, set timed goals, and receive reminders for consistent learning habits.

title: Ethical Website Penetration Testing Using Weevely, SecLists & Gobuster
desc:
Successfully performed a legal and ethical penetration test on a vulnerable web server as part of a cybersecurity training exercise.
Used a combination of Gobuster for directory brute-forcing (via SecLists) and Weevely to establish a web shell for post-exploitation analysis.

title: Portfolio Website
desc:
Developed a responsive portfolio website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to showcase my projects and skills.
Utilized modern web development techniques to create an engaging and interactive user experience.
Integrated with LinkedIn API to display my professional profile and achievements.
